meanings.sent1: She fended off the bullies at school.
meanings.sent2: The knight fended against the dragon's fiery breath.
meanings.sent3: He fended off the mosquitoes with a strong repellent.
meanings.sent4: The mother bird fended off predators to protect her nest.
meanings.sent5: The brave soldier fended off the enemy attack single-handedly.

meanings.definition: managed to cope with a difficult situation
meanings.sent1: Despite the challenges, she fended off the stress and stayed calm.
meanings.sent2: He fended through the storm and reached safety.
meanings.sent3: The team fended off the pressure and emerged victorious.
meanings.sent4: She fended off the doubts and pursued her dreams.
meanings.sent5: He fended through tough times with determination and resilience.

meanings.sent1: The self-fended explorer carried all necessary supplies.
meanings.sent2: She was a self-fended individual, always prepared for any situation.
meanings.sent3: The self-fended family grew their own food and lived sustainably.
meanings.sent4: He admired her self-fended lifestyle and independence.
meanings.sent5: The self-fended community thrived even in harsh conditions.
